original_text: However, after his brothers had left for the festival, he went also, not publicly, but in secret.
korean_text: 그 형제들이 명절에 올라간 후에 자기도 올라가시되 나타내지 않고 은밀히 가시니라

sentences.original_text: However, after his brothers had left for the festival
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그의 형제들이 축제를 위해 떠난 후에
